# scm_http_header_profile (Data Source)

Retrieves a config item.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "scm_http_header_profile" "example" {
  id = "1234-56-789"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

- `id` (String) The Id param.
